title: Scotts Bluff National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia         Eagle Rock with Wagons   The photographs in our photo galleries are royalty free and available for download. Another source for photos of Scotts Bluff National Monument is our Flickr Stream.  Â                 Bluffs in Bloom   16 Photos  The wildflowers and plants of Scotts Bluff National Monument.          Historic Photos   10 Photos  Once Scotts Bluff National Monument was created in 1919, little was done until the 1930s. In 1932, NPS Director Horace Albright verbally approved building a road to the top of the bluff, starting a decade of building and improvements that have survived many years of use and will continue to.          Wagons   20 Photos  Scotts Bluff National Monument is a great place to learn about pioneer wagons.            Scenic Photos of Scotts Bluff   6 Photos  Photos of Scotts Bluff National Monument.
